long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Accessing Beatport Top Tracker has never been so easy!
With our brand new Chrome Extension, you will reach BP Top Tracker in one click when you are browsing Beatport.

As soon as you are on the Beatport website, you will see the BP Top Tracker icon in the address bar. Click it and il will open in a new tab the corresponding page (artist, track, release, label, top, ...) on BP Top Tracker.
